title: Batch Anforderung to Kontrolle Mapping
description: Schema for the AI model's output when mapping a batch of Anforderungen to G++ Kontrollen.

matched_controls.description: A list of mappings between BSI controls and G++ controls.

bsi_control_id.description: The ID of the BSI control.

matched_gpp_control_id.description: The ID of the best-matched G++ 'control', or null if no match is found.
